meanings: (빛깔이) be[get] dyed, be[get] colored, be tinged (with)
(사상·풍조 등에) be influenced[affected] (by), be tinged (with), (formal) be imbued (with); (나쁜 사상 등에) be tainted (with)

examples.korean: The whole shirt will turn blue. 발음듣기 셔츠 전체가 온통 퍼렇게 물들텐데. Neungyule
examples.english: The whole shirt will turn blue. 발음

examples.korean: The government said it opened a reservoir to flush out the polluted water, and we cannot see any pollution. 발음듣기 정부가 말하길 저수지문을 열어 오염된물들을 흘려보냈다고 하는데, 우리는 그 어떤 오염물질도 보질 못했어요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government said it opened a reservoir to flush out the polluted water, and we cannot see any pollution. 발음

examples.korean: Yi Gu, who spoke almost no Korean and lived in obscurity in Japan, died alone of heart attack, thus closing the chapter of another royal member whose life had been stained with torments of our treacherous modern history. 발음듣기 한국어를 거의 못하고 일본에서 무명으로 살았던 이구씨는 이로 우리의 씁쓸한 현대사의 고통으로 물들 또 다른 왕실가족의 장을 닫으며 홀로 심장마비로 사망하였다. Neungyule
examples.english: Yi Gu, who spoke almost no Korean and lived in obscurity in Japan, died alone of heart attack, thus closing the chapter of another royal member whose life had been stained with torments of our treacherous modern history. 발음

examples.korean: Then, the water in clouds turns into small rain drops and falls back down to the ground. 발음듣기 그러면, 구름 속의 물들이 작은 빗방울들로 변하여 다시 땅으로 떨어지게 되는 것입니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Then, the water in clouds turns into small rain drops and falls back down to the ground. 발음

examples.korean: a blank sheet 발음듣기 백지; (선악 어느 쪽에나 물들 수 있는) 백지처럼 순진한 마음. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
